content: See first hand what success truly tastes like by digging into these edible 24 karat gold lollipops. These lavish treats come in sets of six and are each filled with 24 karat gold flakes that give this treat an opulent appearance and a one of a kind taste.

Pay homage to your favorite martial artist during your next game night using these Bruce Lee cards. The back of each card features an image of the iconic actor/fighter, while the color scheme on the front pays homage to his iconic suit from the Game Of Death.

Give your game room some old school flair by decorating it with this Super Mario Amiibo display stand. Modeled like the iconic Super Mario Bros. finish line, the stand is 15 inches tall and features enough room to display up to 6 Amiibo figurines.

Illuminate your humble abode’s darkest spots without any fuss using this dimmable motion activated light. Once installed, it automatically lights up when it senses motion and features an adjustable automatic shut off timer you can set between 30 seconds to 10 minutes.

Bring some style to the way you enjoy your wine by serving it out of this aerator and decanter glass.This elegant glass sits on a sleek stainless steel base and helps enhance both flavor and aroma by aerating your wine while you fill the decanter.

titleEN: How To Run A Drug Cartel
content: Learn everything necessary for your budding narcotics racket to thrive using this “How To Run A Cartel” book. This compelling read guides you through every aspect of this multi-billion dollar business – from creating brand value to fine-tuning customer service.

Cruise around town in true Pokemaster fashion by modifying your ride with this pokeball shift knob. This geeky knob is crafted from durable resin and styled in the form of the iconic pokeball, and can fit onto nearly any screw type shift knob.

Your man won’t be able to keep his eyes – or hands – off you when you slip into this bubble wrap lingerie. The risque design of these unique unmentionables covers up all your naughty bits yet leaves little to the imagination. Remember: once you pop, you can’t stop!

Take the first steps into the world of advanced neurotechnologies with this smartphone controlled RoboRoach. The kit allows you to be able to wirelessly control the movement of a roach by micro-stimulation of the nerves in their antennae.

Get a roaring fire going in mere seconds with help from this instant fire starter. These easy to use portable packets feature a custom blend of volcanic rock, recycled wood, and food-grade paraffin designed to ignite in all types of weather conditions.

Reduce the discomfort caused by bug stings using this sting and bite venom sucker next time you get bit. This chemical free device provides immediate itch relief and reduces swelling by naturally removing bug poison from your body.

Slice and dice without fear of accidentally chopping off your fingers using these cut resistant gloves. These specialized gloves feature an exclusive cut resistant technology that prevents damage to your precious fingers when they come in contact with the blade.

Comfortably grow your favorite veggies all year round without making a mess using this self sustaining aquarium garden. The kit includes everything necessary to transform any 10 gallon tank into a lively ecosystem.

Shave precious seconds off the mundane task of tying your shoes using this rapid boot lacing system. You simply pull, cinch and wrap the strap around to create a secure hold that won’t come untied or leave any dangling laces.

Bring a touch of whimsy into your living room by lighting the place up with this giant floor lamp. Styled like an over sized desk lamp, it sports a sturdy aluminum design that can be adjusted just like its smaller counterpart and comes in five color options.

Keeping a clean home has never been easier thanks to this touchless vacuum cleaner. This state of the art appliance is built with infrared sensors designed to automatically activate its 1000 watt cyclonic vacuum when trash is swept near it.

Save space in your kitchen by keeping your cutlery discreetly stored in this under cabinet magnetic knife rack. Apart from de-cluttering your counter top, it keeps your knives perfectly organized and always at hand when you need them.

Trek through mother nature without losing touch with the modern world by keeping your phone charged using this solar powered backpack. This waterproof pack features a 7 watt solar panel capable of charging your phone in just 3 to 4 hours.

This personal water filtration straw will ensure that no matter where you are in the world you’ll always have clean drinking water. It sports a sturdy steel body and removes up to 99.99% of waterborne bacteria and any odors or bad taste.

Go from the boardroom to the rave without needing an outfit change by topping off your look with this sound-activated light up tie. This 17 inch tie features a sound responsive equalizer that dances to the beat of the music.

Instantly create a party atmosphere in any room in your home by playing your tunes out of this prism projector speaker. Apart from providing crisp sound, the speaker contains 16 embedded LEDs that project incredible color displays onto the walls.

Avoid a trip to the emergency room when working with fire by wearing these extreme heat resistant gloves. They provide a flexible and comfy fit and are designed to withstand temperatures of up to 932 degrees Fahrenheit.

Jam out to your favorite songs during cleaning time using this Bluetooth shower speaker. The speaker comes with a built-in suction cup and features a compact and sturdy water resistant design available in a variety of vibrant color schemes.

Bring a quaint rustic touch to any part of your home by hanging your belongings on this tree trunk coat rack. The coast rack is made from a natural and beautifully colored mangosteen tree trunk that’s sanded down to a smooth finish.

Keep your tootsies warm and looking cute on cold days with these Totoro Soot Sprite slippers. Each slipper features a large and adorable fuzzy black creature guaranteed to brighten up your day and put a smile on your face.

titleEN: The Life Changing Magic Of Tidying Up
content: Declutter your life once and for all by learning the fine art of cleaning up. In “The Life Changing Magic of Tidying Up”, Japanese cleaning guru Marie Kondo demonstrates how to properly simplify and organize your home so that it remains clean.

Customize your ride to reflect your quirky personality with these cat car headrest pillows. They come with an elastic band for easy tying and feature extremely life-like images of cute and cuddly felines – making it perfect for cat lovers.

Keep your favorite fermented grape juice fresh long after you open it by placing it inside this modern boxed wine dispenser. It’s capable of holding three liters and is designed to keep wine fresh for up to six weeks after you pour your first glass.

Engage in mobile warfare like never before by jumping on this NERF battle go-kart. This pedal-powered ride features a reinforced inverted trike design and comes with a quick response steering wheel for unmatched maneuverability.

Instantly create a party environment anywhere you go with this USB disco light. The light features a flexible cable you can adjust to any position and comes with multiple light settings so you can alternate between a party, an emergency, or a reading light.

Keep your pooch hydrated while on the go using this portable water bottle and bowl. The intelligent design incorporates a handy bowl into the lid that flips open so your pet can easily drink up – making it a must have for adventurous pet owners.

Get the privacy you need to enjoy a peaceful nap while traveling using this hooded neck pillow. While the comfy pillow cradles your neck and supports your head, the breathable hood covers your face so you can easily block out ambient light.

Create an otherworldly ambiance in your bedroom using this lighting ball lamp. The base produces high frequency electromagnetic waves that cause the gases to turn into plasma – so that when you touch the glass a beam follows your finger’s movement.

Add some testosterone to mealtime by chowing down using these wrench utensils. They’re crafted from steel for unmatched durability and come with a novelty wrench design at the base that any bonafide handy man will love.

Give yourself a manicure the easy way with help from this wearable nail polish holder. This over sized silicone ring fits comfortably over your fingers and is designed to grip the bottle securely so you can move around freely without fear of spills.

With the Donald Trump toilet paper you’ll finally have a chance to shit all over this mockery of a presidential candidate. Each square comes printed with a black and grey portrait of the eccentric billionaire eagerly waiting to taste the remnants of your chocolate dragon.

Enjoy snacking on shelled nuts without leaving a mess behind by serving them in this double dish snack bowl. The dual layer design allows you to hide the pits and shells underneath the serving bowl so they remain out of sight until you’re ready to throw them out.

Transform your backyard into a tropical oasis for the kids with this inflatable water slide bounce house. The house features a bounce area, pool, and slide that are all made from a heavy-duty vinyl – making it ideal for outdoor use all year round.

Minimize nighttime accidents when walking around the campgrounds by setting up your shelter using these light up tent stakes. They’re made from durable aluminum and come with 18 lumen LEDs that stay lit for up to 10 hours of continuous use.

Practice your passion without disrupting those around you by playing on this Yamaha silent guitar. It features a comfortable mahogany neck and maple body in addition to an onboard preamp system with a headphone jack so you can practice silently.

Brighten up any room in more ways than one with one of these spilled paint lamps. The whimsical design creates the illusion that a bucket of paint is suspended midair as it drips its colorful contents down to the base of the lamp.

Expand your horizons in unexpected ways by delving into Reddit’s Ask Me Anything book. The first of its kind, this unique read gives you complete access to a collection of some of the most riveting, insightful, and intriguing Q&A sessions on Reddit.

Experience a classic bar snack in whole new way by digging into some deep fried peanuts – with shell and all. These protein packed treats are high in fiber, feature an all round crunchy texture and come coated in delicious seasonings.

Make the perfect snowball in a fraction of the time as anyone else with help from this snowball maker. The scissor-like design allows you to easily scoop a lump of snow off the ground and mold it into a perfect sphere in roughly one second.

Give yourself one more reason to never want to get out of bed in the morning by snuggling up with this pepperoni pizza bed cover. The duvet comes emblazoned with a realistic image of a mouth-watering cheesy and greasy pizza pie.

This illuminated iPhone case provides flattering lighting conditions so you can take the perfect selfie no matter where you are. The light up edges can also be used as a backup flashlight, and as a notification light for text messages and phone calls.

Increase the functionality of your home’s light switches using these useful magnetic screws. They come with a magnetized surface that serves as the ideal location for hanging things like your house keys and other metallic knickknacks.

Put Aquaman to shame by improving your performance on the water using these webbed fingers swimming gloves. Perfect for beginners – these silicone gloves slip over your fingers, allowing you to swiftly propel yourself through the water.

Give your feline friend yet another reason to loathe your existence by dressing him up in this cat pirate costume. This adorable ensemble goes over your pet’s two front legs and is made from a soft and breathable fabric to provide a comfortable fit.

Take the first step towards becoming a crazy cat lady by purchasing the “Crafting With Cat Hair” book. This fully illustrated read expertly guides you every step of the way so you can transform your kitty’s excess hair into creepy works of art.

Effortlessly add a touch of opulence to your ride’s interior by installing this ignition button bling. It features an easy to apply adhesive backing and comes encrusted in gorgeous crystals available in either silver, pink, or blue hues.

Transform your yard into the ideal spot for a little R&R with this wooden cedar hot tub. Made from top quality cedar, it features a 1/8 HP pump, a gas or propane heater with electronic ignition, and has the capacity to seat up to eight comfortably.

Stop getting out of the pool every time you want a drink – now you can keep them nearby on this floating cocktail table! Made from a durable stain and fade resistant fabric, this fluffy table comes with 4 cup holders and a convenient built-in bucket holder.

Leave the competition in the dust when you get behind the controls of the Yeti R/C trophy truck. With a top speed of 40 MPH, it features a solid rear axle, high quality off-road desert tires, and an independent rear suspension for unmatched handling.

titleEN: The Man Who Made Things Out Of Trees
content: The Man Who Made Things Out Of Trees is the fascinating read that tells the story of how one individual cut down a single tree to see how many things could be crafted from it. It features vivid storytelling in addition to 8 pages of lively illustrations.

There’s no better way to sizzle under the hot sun than on this pepperoni pizza beach blanket. This circular 100% microfiber towel measures five feet across and features a mouth watering pepperoni pizza design across its entire surface.

Turn heads while you play your favorite tunes from these cat ear headphones. Apart from emitting an eye-catching neon light, the cat ears double as external headphones you can use to share your music with those around you.

Give your overworked and mistreated hands some much needed love by applying this working hands cream on a regular basis. Its unique formula contains a high Glycerin concentration designed to draw and retain moisture, improving skin texture.

Prepare your favorite noodle based meal in a fraction of the time by making it on this rapid Ramen noodle cooker. This compact dishwasher safe bowl is designed to perfectly fit a block of Ramen noodles and fully cook them in just 3 minutes.

titleEN: The Bucket List Journal For Couples
content: Accomplish the goals you and your better half always talked about by writing them down in The Bucket List Journal For Couples. It’s divided into 7 categories that are designed to help you and your significant other put your goals into action.

Keep your little snow leopard’s hands warm in the frigid cold by using these paw shaped mittens. Apart from their lively design, these waterproof mittens feature an elastic gauntlet strap to seal out snow and a quick-release wrist buckle for easy removal.

Make your disgusting smoking habit look a little cooler by sparking your cancer stick using this cigarette shaped lighter. This sleek refillable butane lighter comes disguised as a metallic cigarette with a pop off top that reveals a handy flame.

The belt has finally been reinvented to fit better. The Trakline express belt doesn’t utilize a traditional hole system – instead it uses a revolutionary hidden track and proprietary belt buckle to give you a perfect fit on anywhere from a 24″ to 44″ waist!

Give your little daredevil the adrenaline pumping ride a regular swing just can’t match by installing this surfboard swing in your backyard. Made of rock hard maple, it features two handles to help with balance and can be adjusted to suit any sized rider.

Give your room an eerie touch that’ll freak out your band mates by hanging your ax on this zombie hand guitar hanger. This easy to adjust hanger swivels to accommodate your guitar’s style and features a cushioned insert to protect the neck of your instrument.

Keep your smart device fixed at the optimum position in your vehicle by placing it on this cup holder mount. The mount installs without any external tools and is designed to accommodate a large variety of smartphone and tablet sizes.

The line between assault rifles and cross bows just got blurrier thanks to the Crosman Airbow. This 8 shot air bow fires fully sized arrows out of a rifle style gun at speeds of 425 FPS and can be easily operated using just 2 fingers.

titleEN: Solar Powered Light Up Mason Jar
content: Keep your yard lit up without adding to your electric bill by using this solar powered light up mason jar lid. The metallic lid fits any standard mason jar and comes with an embedded solar panel that provides up to 12 hours of light on a single charge.

Bring your furry friend along for all your adventures by using this dog carrying backpack. It features wide adjustable length shoulders straps that displace weight evenly – making it perfect for hiking, biking, or just walking around like a crazy pet parent.

Straining and rinsing fruits and veggies has never been easier thanks to this over the sink cutting board. This dishwasher safe cutting board comes with non-slip edges and features a built-in collapsible silicone strainer with a 2.5 quart capacity.

Bring a touch of sophistication to your man cave by storing your hooch inside this sixteenth century globe bar. The hollowed out inside of this 22″ diameter globe comes hand painted with lovely frescos while the exterior displays an antique 16th century nautical map.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Body Paint
content: Go from plain Jane to queen of Burning Man by making yourself over with this glow in the dark body paint. This non-toxic washable paint goes on easy, comes in 7 outrageous neon colors and emits a brilliant glow under UV lighting.

Bring the party to any tailgate with this truck bed beer pong table. Weighing only six pounds, it installs in just minutes and comes with preformed cup holders to provide a perfect rack every time with absolutely no sliding.

Keep your pooch happy and fed while you’re away by using the smart pet feeder. It easily connects to your home’s network and comes with a built-in webcam that allows you to effortlessly check up on your pup at anytime.

Bring a touch of class to the way you protect your phone by covering it in this furry iPhone case. This fashionable eye-catching piece is designed to easily snap on and provide an ultra soft faux fur feel that protects and feels great to the touch.

Take a shot to the face and live to see another day by pounding your drinks out of the revolver shot glass. This intricately crafted glass stands on its own and is designed to hold up to 50ml of your favorite poison without spilling a drop.

This full body resistance training suit proves that you don’t need an expensive gym membership to get a heart-pumping workout. After strapping the lightweight harness, the extending rubber bands will provide added resistance to your entire body.

Keep yourself lubricated without arousing suspicion by discreetly drinking out of this bracelet flask. This must-have alcoholic accessory cleverly conceals a 2.5 ounce stainless steel flask within its stylish and unassuming bracelet shape.

Keep all your mobile devices fully juiced without occupying every outlet in your home by using this seven port circular charging hub. The compact design fits virtually anywhere and eliminates the need for excess cables, outlets, and power strips.

Take your liver on a cross-country journey of inebriation as you try to fill the entire beer cap maps. This novelty wooden map lets you display your vast bottle cap collection with regards to their geographic origin making this a great accent for any home bar.

Transform any sitting area into a mobile office with help from this bamboo lap workstation. It comes with a honeycomb surface to provide ventilation for your devices and is built to accommodate a variety of tablets and smartphones as well.

Learn how to make top-shelf Chinese cuisine while immersing yourself in the story of the Mission Chinese Food restaurant. Written by famed chef Danny Bowien, you’ll learn the tips and tricks necessary to whip up these heavenly plates.

Get a grueling workout without needing a gym membership by using this portable body weight training device. Made from aerospace grade aluminum and hard maple, it allows you to perform an endless array of challenging workouts just about anywhere.

Turn any location into your personal movie theater with this high-res mobile projector. Equipped with its own SD card reader, speaker and internal battery, this compact 2″ cube allows you to project images and movies up to 120″.

Get real scientific answers to the absurd hypothetical situations you’ve always wondered about by reading “What If?”. Written by former NASA roboticist Randall Munroe, it provides detailed answers to questions like “how much Force power can Yoda output?”.

There’s always time to fit a chilled cup of java into your busy day when you’ve got the hyper fast iced coffee maker! This 12.5 ounce container can chill a hot coffee by up to 130 degrees in just 60 seconds without dilution and can also be used with other beverages.

Entertain your guests with an eye-catching visual display courtesy of this wave fire pit table. This propane powered table is crafted from aluminum and features 3 black coated interwoven tubes that run along the base to create a fiery wave like effect.

Amaze and baffle your friends next time you meet for drinks by sipping out of this upside down wine glass. This soda-lime glass stemware allows you to easily sip from the base as your wine appears to be suspended mid air.

Originally released in 1999, the cult classic “Dancing With Cats” is back for a whole new generation of cat-lovers to gush over. Each page depicts a hilarious photo of a cat and their human sharing some quality time as they perform a variety of elegant poses.

Give your home or garage the added storage space it needs using one of these shipping container cabinets. These portable cabinets can be stacked up like boxes, provide a sturdy and safe place to store your stuff, and can be locked from the outside for easy transport.

Put an electric new twist on a classic game using this hot potato shock ball. The ball is encased in a protective plastic layer and emits small electric shock pulses at random intervals between the 10 and 30 second marks.

Show off your fondness for the classics with these geeky Vincent van Gogh paintings. Each vibrant work of art displays a unique and vibrant mashup of geeky franchises like Star Wars or Super Mario Bros. painted in van Gogh’s iconic style.

Cook an authentic brick oven like pizza pie on your plain stovetop using this ingenious pizza oven. You simply place the stainless steel oven right over the stove and within minutes it will reach temperatures of 600°F so your pizza cooks in mere minutes.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Galaxy Necklace
content: Bring along the magic and beauty of our vast cosmos wherever you go by accenting your outfit with this glow in the  dark galaxy necklace. Available in a bronze or silver finish, the 1.5″ locket opens up to reveal a breathtaking abstract image of our galaxy.

Keep your grocery cart from becoming a chaotic mess with help from these reusable fold-out shopping cart bags. These heavy duty bags allow you to keep everything organized while you shop, making them easy to grab and go once you’re done.

Channel the power of the Dark Side to protect yourself against grease stains by putting on this Darth Vader apron. This one size fits most cotton apron comes designed like Vader’s iconic suit and is machine washable so you can always keep it looking like new.

Enjoy a peaceful night’s rest when roughing it outdoors by keeping yourself off the uneven ground with this sky nest hanging tent. After suspending the tent from two points, you and all your gear will remain high and dry during the night.

titleEN: The Magic Of Not Giving A Fuck Book
content: Stop spending time you don’t have with people you don’t like doing things you don’t want to do. The Magic Of Not Giving A Fuck teaches you how to let go of things like “family drama” or not having the ideal “bikini body” and gets you to focus on what really matters.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark NERF Football
content: Keep the game going long after the sun sets by playing with this glow in the dark NERF football. The football features the classic soft NERF exterior and emits a bright greenish glow so you can play for hours on a single charge.

Burn off some much needed calories while you’re anchored to your desk with help from this sit down elliptical machine. The patented hinges allow your feet and lower legs to move as they please without disturbing the rest of your body.
